Player History
Injured on 7/1/1965 with a Sprained Wrist, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/2/1967, off Jim McAndrew (SF)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/22/1967, off Bob Sadowski (STL)...
Injured on 8/3/1967 with a Fractured Cheekbone, out for 8 weeks...
Traded from Chicago (N) to New York (A) on 4/18/1970 (Going to CHC: 1B J. Pepitone. Going to NYY: SS R. Burleson, LF R. Severson, P D. Downs)...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/4/1970, hitting .550 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/16/1972, hitting .571 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/30/1972, hitting .423 with 3 HR, 12 RBI...
Was selected to the 1973 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/22/1973, hitting .538 with 3 HR, 5 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Chicago (A) on 10/2/1973...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/19/1975, hitting .542 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/1975, hitting .394 with 5 HR, 19 RBI...
Was selected to the 1975 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/28/1975 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won World Series with New York (A) in 1976...
Drove in 6 runs against Baltimore on 9/15/1977...
